column1: #text=In the morning , I had to get ready to go to work .
#text=At the time , I did n't have a car , and the weather was too wet and windy to use a bicycle for transportation .
#text=After a quick breakfast , I got my good shoes on and a jacket .
#text=Out the door , I locked the deadbolt and went for the bus stop about 5 blocks away from my house .
#text=I called the bus lines number and input the code on my phone corresponding to the bus arrival at my stop , and realized I only had a 3 minute wait .
#text=The bus arrived , and I paid the fare for my 2-hour ticket .
#text=I went to the back of the bus , as there were no seats in the front .
#text=The bus came to life as it passed other stops without passengers , and we eventually got to the transit station , where I was able to walk by foot the rest of the way to my workplace .
